timeline.message:
Review of the Synop Analyzer binding.
Added a French synop database, so auto discovery is now possible.

Signed-off-by: clinique <gael@lhopital.org>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Put it in a try-with-resources (and you can remove the close()):

Suggested change
InputStream is = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("/db/stations.json");
try {
Reader reader = new InputStreamReader(is, "UTF-8");
try (InputStream is = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("/db/stations.json");
Reader reader = new InputStreamReader(is, "UTF-8");) {

Also run mvn spotless:apply just to make sure it formats correctly.
timeline.author: Hilbrand

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
import tec.uom.se.unit.Units;
import org.eclipse.smarthome.core.library.unit.SIUnits;
timeline.author: Hilbrand

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
properties.put("Distance", new QuantityType<>(distance, Units.METRE).toString());
properties.put("Distance", new QuantityType<>(distance, SIUnits.METRE).toString());
timeline.author: Hilbrand

timeline.body: 2 seconds seems relatively short. It means the discovery process is killed if it didn't finish in 2 seconds.
timeline.bodyText: 2 seconds seems relatively short. It means the discovery process is killed if it didn't finish in 2 seconds.
